Count me in...


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: itcdeadpeople 
  T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, April 07, 2008 3:39 PM
  Subjec=
t: [EVP-ITC] Any eBay sellers willing to do this?


  I was thinking if som=
eone would list a FREE DOWNLOAD of instructions for the various hacks 
  on=
 the Radio Shack units, it could put an end to the business for sellers tha=
t are taking 
  advantage of people who are unaware that they could probabl=
y hack the units for 
  themselves. 

  I have seen "downloads" of various =
things listed before. Why not this?

  Margaret
